text: Remap shortcuts Edit shortcuts to activate and then configure the actions to happen when activated. Example of a remapping: Select "Alt+T" and send "Ctrl+T" only on Microsoft Edge. "MSEdge" (exe name) would be your "Target app". Note: if you remapped a key, that will influence the shortcut.
